direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods interact with the iterators and modify the internal state of the CollatingIterator.
Both methods modify the internal state of the CollatingIterator by clearing or removing elements.
The remove method depends on the lastReturned index set by the next method.
The remove method indirectly depends on the least method through the next method, which uses least to determine the next element.
Both methods manipulate the iterators list, which is a shared resource.
Both methods manipulate the iterators list, which is a shared resource.
The remove method indirectly depends on the anyHasNext method through the hasNext method, which checks if any iterator has remaining elements.
The remove method indirectly depends on the anyValueSet method through the hasNext method, which checks if any value is set.
